Package ss.othello.server

Class ClientHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ss.othello.server.ClientHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class ClientHandler
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class is responsible for handling the client requests and sending the responses back to the client.

                              throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        opponentName - the name of the opponent that we want to check
